title: REPSY
description: App facilitating Doctors to schedule appointments with Pharma Reps & Speakers to discuss treatment options for specific conditions. Provides efficacy, safety, and guidelines for each treatment.
languages: React Native, Native Base, Flux Router, PostgreSQL, Node.js, Knex.js, Timekit.io, JavaScript

title: VolClock
description: An app to track shifts, view upcoming schedule and contact supervisors for the TRU thrift store in Boulder, CO.

title: HikingInTheRain
description: Simple app to acquire weather conditions at the trailhead of potential hikes. This app will provide alternative search options for events near you if no hikes match your search criteria.
